raw_body: SINNIAH - TALIA SHALINI. Darling daughter of Chinna (Bernard) and Anita, beloved sister of Michael and Kevin, loving granddaughter of the late B.R.R. and Jeyadevi Sinniah and the late Allan and Philomena Seneviratne, passed away peacefully on the 12th of January 2024. Her funeral will take place at All Saints Church, Hersham U.K. on the 1st of February 2024. ’’Dale Cottage’’ No. 182, Silverdale avenue, Walton-on-Thames,
